attributes.action: Review EU referendum result following findings of Tory overspending in elections
attributes.background: Following the channel 4 investigation into the conservative party overspending, we should wait for findings from the electoral commision and several police forces until taking any action on the result of the EU referendum. If found to have broken rules then the referendum should be put under review.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what 2015 general election expenses have to do with the 2016 EU referendum. If you want a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
